"Loser Form":
"The Dark Blast \"Loser Form\" has been unlocked!

Loser Form allows you to fly freely through the air.

・Ascend: <%Jump>
・Descend: Descend naturally over time, or use the skill \"Dive Assault\"

Loser Form fights best at long range, taking advantage of its high-speed movement.
※Cannot perform Just Attacks"
